hero.title: A united step towards a brighter future
hero.subtitle: is the true beginning of change
hero.description: Aakar Pratishthan is dedicated to bringing positive transformation in the lives of underprivileged communities.
hero.foundingtext: Since our founding on August 20, 2023, we have been committed to creating opportunities for society's holistic development through inclusive education, healthcare access, sports training, and cultural enrichment.
hero.calltoaction: Join us in our mission to create a better future for all.

whatnext.title: What's Next?
whatnext.subtitle: Discover the many ways you can engage with our mission

getInvolved.title: Get Involved with us!
getInvolved.description: Join us in making a difference! Explore our programs in education, sports, and community development. Volunteer, donate, or partner with us to empower underprivileged students and strengthen communities.

explorePrograms.title: Explore Our Programs
explorePrograms.description: Discover transformative education, sports, and community development initiatives. From scholarships to skill-building workshops that empower underprivileged students.

upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.description: Join community events, workshops, and awareness programs. Engage with our mission through meaningful activities and connect with like-minded individuals.

missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.description: Join our mission to empower students and strengthen communities through volunteering, partnerships, and advocacy. Make a lasting impact alongside us.

inNews.title: In the News
inNews.description: Read the news articles and media coverage about our impactful work in empowering students and strengthening communities.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have questions or want to get involved? Reach out to us for more information about our programs, events, and how you can support our mission.
